text: Nagrama tami'noa mopani'afintira tamazeri vatinetre'na, ama ra mono noma Nagri nagi ahentesga hugahazema hu'nama erinte ruotage'ma hu'noa mono nona namefi humigahue. Ana hanugeno mago avame'za meankna hu'nenige'za maka kaziga ama mopafima mani'naza vahe'mo'za nege'za, ama ana mono nonkura kizazokago ke huntegahaze.
